org.daisy.streamline.api.media

Class DefaultAnnotatedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.api.media.DefaultAnnotatedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedInputStream, FileDetails, InputStreamSupplier

    public final class DefaultAnnotatedInputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnnotatedInputStream
    Provides a default implementation of AnnotatedInputStream.

      • getSystemId

        public java.lang.String getSystemId()
        Description copied from interface: InputStreamSupplier

        Gets the system identifier. The system identifier can be included in error messages and warnings.

        If the system identifier is a URL, it can also be used to resolve links to relative resources. However, one should keep in mind that the content of the resource at the specified URL might not be identical to the content supplied by InputStreamSupplier.newInputStream(). The URL might even point to a non-existing resource. For these reasons, a consumer should avoid opening a connection to the URL and instead use InputStreamSupplier.newInputStream().

        If the system identifier is a URL, it must be fully resolved (it may not be a relative URL).

        Specified by:
        getSystemId in interface InputStreamSupplier
        Returns:
        the system identifier
